DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective is to assess whether the risk of gastric cancer is increased in pantoprazole users compared to users of other proton pump inhibitors.
DOC.brief_title: Risk of Cancer Among Pantoprazole Users
DOC.detailed_description: All subjects who met the inclusion criteria were included in the study.
DOC.criteria: Patients who have used pantoprazole or other proton pump inhibitors, enrollment in the health maintenance organization for at least 6 months, age 18 years or older. Use of any proton pump inhibitor before study entry, any cancer diagnosis recorded in the medical history, diagnosis of ZollingerEllison Syndrome in medical history.
